snippet.title: Strange Brigade – E3 2018 Teaser | PC, PS4, Xbox One
snippet.description:
Don't fail to visit and subscribe to https://www.youtube.com/strangebrigade for EXCLUSIVE content from Strange Brigade during E3 2018!

From the creators of Sniper Elite 4 and Zombie Army Trilogy comes a rip-roaring 1930s adventure for 1-4 players filled with pulse-pounding action, treacherous traps, and tales of derring-do … 

Embark on an exotic safari into DANGER where few dare go and fewer return! Encounter FANTASTIC and forgotten civilizations shrouded in MYSTERY! Uncover TREACHEROUS tombs and unfathomable EVIL, never-before-seen by any human now living … 

Stay tuned!


Find us on our social media pages for more updates and thrills:

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/rebellion_official/
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/strangebrigade/ 
Twitter https://twitter.com/StrangeBrigade
Rebellion Discord: https://discord.gg/rebellion
Rebellion Game Store: https://games.rebellionstore.com/en/
